xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 22 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 03:12 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 03:35 <Guest57915> has joined #ccm 07:02 <Guest57915> has joined #ccm 07:12 <sdumitriu> Hey Guest57915 10:39 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 13:24 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:25 <sdumitriu1> Hey kushalk124 13:25 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 13:29 <kushalk124> Hey going ok 13:29 <kushalk124> Trying to make my net work :( 13:29 <kushalk124> dont have an active connection 13:29 <kushalk124> so trying to run from mobile 13:30 <kushalk124> Tell me one thing , I can do one thing , i can create form for both imperial and metric and keep one hidden and witch based on option 13:30 <kushalk124> or how do I create elemets 13:30 <kushalk124> from 13:30 <kushalk124> new Element('input') 13:30 <kushalk124> Needed some help but my net connection :( 13:31 <sdumitriu1> new Element("input", {"type": "text", "id": "blabla"}) 13:31 <sdumitriu1> That gives you an input element 13:31 <kushalk124> Yes 13:31 <kushalk124> Trying this 13:32 <kushalk124> This task came at a time when I was not in town :( 13:32 <kushalk124> And now I am in a different city for next 2 months ... 13:32 <kushalk124> trying to do it asap 13:32 <sdumitriu1> Then you have to insert it somewhere in the form 13:32 <kushalk124> I am hiding the old inputs 13:32 <kushalk124> and would insert in place of those 13:33 <sdumitriu1> For example: metricInput.insert({"after": newInput }) 13:43 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 13:46 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:46 <Guest24002> Net :/ 14:09 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 15:04 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 16:04 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 16:06 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 17:04 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 17:49 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 18:24 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm
